data.author: halfrabbit

changelog.release_notes: * Fixed weather (Updated to using OpenWeatherMap API key).

Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect.
Shake to animate.
Animation frequency settings.
All options configurable.
Enhanced animation quality.
Pikachu now has correct tail.
Weather retrieval more robust.

V1.1 - Fixed bug where Fahrenheit would revert to Celsius (sorry!).
Note: Setting for animation frequency and other enhancements coming soon.

data.description:
• Features an animated Pikachu with dash attack!
• A Pokeball is visible on screen when connected to your phone.
• The HP meter displays remaining battery.
• Current day and date displayed.
• Weather retrieved from OpenWeatherMap.

Configuration Options:
• Animation frequency.
• Shake to animate.
• Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect.
• Weather (Celsius or Fahrenheit).
• Date format (ddmm or mmdd).

This is solely a not-for-profit fan activity, and in no way intends to infringe on copyrights held by Pokémon/Nintendo.

Tags: Pikachu, Pokemon, Pokémon, Nintendo.

latest_release.release_notes: * Fixed weather (Updated to using OpenWeatherMap API key).

data.title: PikaTime
